name: ACameraActor
doc: A CameraActor is a camera viewpoint that can be placed in a level.

AutoActivateForPlayer: Specifies which player controller, if any, should automatically use this Camera when the controller is active.
CameraComponent: The camera component for this camera

methods.name: GetAutoActivatePlayerIndex
methods.doc: Returns index of the player for whom we auto-activate, or INDEX_NONE (-1) if disabled.
